thread.title: Handy location
thread.title_full: Handy location - Review of Timhotel Nation, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: nitherbrocher
title: Handy location
text:
This hotel resembles a fairly shabby Travel Lodge but the beds are clean and comfortable and it is ideally located for sightseeing via the Metro. I was sure I would prove other reviewers' comments about the staff wrong, and I tried hard to be friendly and positive, speaking a little bit of French to be polite. However, the staff were just as described - they have no inclination to interact with their guests, do not make eye contact and behave in a manner that we would consider rather rude and certainly strange. One receptionist was a cross between Mr Bean and Basil Faulty, and one of the female receptionists resembled a member of the Adams Family . However this did not spoil our wonderful trip and we would consider using the hotel again as it was such good value.
